name: Classic Alphas and Betas
short_description:
As of 31-Dec-2012, this repository has had a huge facelift, I've cleaned up the directories and uploaded the installer versions of the alpha, and also added the beta. You can also access the source code via the SVN.

As of 1/01/2013, to celebrate the new year, I've changed this repo to not be Blood exclusive. I will also now be hosting the following alphas\betas:
- Shadow Warrior beta
- Duke Nukem 3D beta
- Duke Nukem 3D alpha
- Doom alphas (0.2, 0.4, 0.5, press-release)

All Blood-related files will remain in their place. A new directory will be made for these games.

IN ORDER FOR THE ALPHA TO WORK:
In DOSBox, you must first run SETUP.EXE and change these settings:

Sound Setup -> SoundBlaster -> 16-bit -> Stereo -> 32 -> 44 KHz -> 220h (default)
-> Sound Blaster 16 or AWE32 -> IRQ 7 -> Channel 1 (default) -> Channel 5 (default)

Music Setup -> General Midi -> 330h (default)

All done, now choose "Save and play" or "Save and exit"
summary: The alpha and beta versions of the PC classics
